author: Simon Difford
description: Created by Cihan Anadologlu, co-owner of Circle By Cihan Anadologlu in Munich, for Patrón Tequila at London Cocktail Week 2016.
name: Mexica
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Tangerine / Mandarin / Clementine juice (fresh juice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
Add 160 grams of dill to 1 litre sugar syrup
Allow to infuse for at least 24 hours, strain and bottle

video.description: Created by Cihan Anadologlu, co-owner of Circle By Cihan Anadologlu in Munich, for Patrón Tequila at London Cocktail Week 2016.
video.name: HOWTO make Mexica
